tiles.name: Waiting Area
tiles.description: Small, seedy waiting area with worn carpet. Directly adjacent to the strip mall parking lot. Flickering fluorescent lights overhead.

tiles.name: Saul's Desk Area
tiles.description: Cluttered desk with files and a landline phone. Walls covered in questionable diplomas.

tiles.name: Filing Cabinet Row
tiles.description: A row of filing cabinets, crammed with files. Some appear to be overflowing.

tiles.name: Parking Lot (Front)
tiles.description: Section of the strip mall parking lot directly in front of Saul's office. Asphalt cracking, some weeds growing through.

tiles.name: Blow-up Statue of Liberty
tiles.description: The iconic, slightly deflated, blow-up Statue of Liberty. Its arm waves erratically in the arid breeze.

tiles.name: Parking Lot (Side)
tiles.description: Asphalt. A view to the side of the parking lot. Dry land and sparse desert foliage visible beyond the parking area.

tiles.name: Entrance/Exit
tiles.description: The entrance to Saul Goodman's office. A glass door with the neon sign 'Better Call Saul' visible. Tiled floor.

tiles.name: Back Wall
tiles.description: The back wall of the office, separating it from the adjacent business. Covered in cheap wood paneling.

tiles.name: Side Wall
tiles.description: One of the side walls of the office, separating it from the adjacent unit. You can hear sounds from next door.
